item.description:
We love Judi's ride to P-Town!   Level 3 ride. ( LONG (hot) day, highway, traffic, bridges involved. For more experienced riders.)

 Rain showers are predicted, so you may want to bring raingear. If it looks like too much rain, the ride will be postponed!

Please be sure that you are ready (experienced) for this ride; it is a long riding day, and quite some distance if you encounter problems.

We hope to arrive early enough to be able to park on the wharf, so be sure to have a few $1 bills on hand to pay at the gate.  We'll then head out and tour the area, have something to eat, and meet back at a designated time for the ride home.
item.name: P-Town Ride (Level 3)
